transform.tRule:
######################################################################## # Encylopedia Aethiopica Transliteration # # https://journals.sub.uni-hamburg.de/toc-aethiopica/Miscellaneous/Aethiopica_Transliteration.pdf # # Initial Editor: Daniel Yacob <yacob@geez.org> # ########################################################################
# MINIMAL FILTER: Amharic-Latin :: [ሀ-፼↔] ; :: NFD (NFC) ;
$geez = 'ä'; $kaib = 'u'; $salis = 'i' ; $rabi = 'a'; $hamis = 'e' ; $sadis = 'ǝ'; $sabi = 'o'; $diqala_geez = 'ʷä'; $diqala_salis = 'ʷi'; ; $diqala_kaib ='ʷǝ'; ; $diqala_rabi = 'ʷa';; $diqala_hamis = 'ʷe';
$glottal = ʾ; $pharyngeal = ʿ;
# Us $geez this $wordBoundary until bug 2034 is fixed in ICU: # http://bugs.icu-project.org/trac/ticket/2034 $wordBoundary = [^[:L:][:M:][:N:]] ;
######################################################################## # Start of Syllabic Transformations ########################################################################
ሀ → h $rabi ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE HA ሁ ↔ h $kaib ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE HU ሂ ↔ h $salis ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE HI ሃ ↔ h $rabi ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE HAA ሄ ↔ h $hamis ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE HEE ህ}$wordBoundary ↔ h ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE HE ህ ↔ h $sadis ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE HE ሆ ↔ h $sabi ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE HO
ለ ↔ l $geez ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE LA ሉ ↔ l $kaib ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE LU ሊ ↔ l $salis ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE LI ላ ↔ l $rabi ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE LAA ሌ ↔ l $hamis ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE LEE ል}$wordBoundary ↔ l ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE LE ል ↔ l $sadis ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE LE ሎ ↔ l $sabi ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE LO ሏ ↔ l $diqala_rabi ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE LWA
ሐ ↔ ḥ $rabi ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE HHA ሑ ↔ ḥ $kaib ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE HHU ሒ ↔ ḥ $salis ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE HHI ሓ ↔ ḥ $rabi ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE HHAA ሔ ↔ ḥ $hamis ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE HHEE ሕ}$wordBoundary ↔ ḥ ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE HHE ሕ ↔ ḥ $sadis ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE HHE ሖ ↔ ḥ $sabi ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE HHO ሗ ↔ ḥ $diqala_rabi ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE HHWA
መ ↔ m $geez ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE MA ሙ ↔ m $kaib ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE MU ሚ ↔ m $salis ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE MI ማ ↔ m $rabi ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE MAA ሜ ↔ m $hamis ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE MEE ም}$wordBoundary ↔ m; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE ME ም ↔ m $sadis ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE ME ሞ ↔ m $sabi ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE MO ሟ ↔ m $diqala_rabi ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE MWA
ሠ ↔ ś $geez ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE SZA ሡ ↔ ś $kaib ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE SZU ሢ ↔ ś $salis ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE SZI ሣ ↔ ś $rabi ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE SZAA ሤ ↔ ś $hamis ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE SZEE ሥ}$wordBoundary ↔ ś ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE SZE ሥ ↔ ś $sadis ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE SZE ሦ ↔ ś $sabi ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE SZO ሧ ↔ ś $diqala_rabi ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE SZWA
ረ ↔ r $geez ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE RA ሩ ↔ r $kaib ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE RU ሪ ↔ r $salis ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE RI ራ ↔ r $rabi ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE RAA ሬ ↔ r $hamis ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE REE ር}$wordBoundary ↔ r ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE RE ር ↔ r $sadis ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE RE ሮ ↔ r $sabi ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE RO ሯ ↔ r $diqala_rabi ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE RWA
ሰ ↔ s $geez ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE SA ሱ ↔ s $kaib ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE SU ሲ ↔ s $salis ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE SI ሳ ↔ s $rabi ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE SAA ሴ ↔ s $hamis ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE SEE ስ}$wordBoundary ↔ s ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE SE ስ ↔ s $sadis ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE SE ሶ ↔ s $sabi ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE SO ሷ ↔ s $diqala_rabi ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE SWA
ሸ ↔ š $geez ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE SHA ሹ ↔ š $kaib ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE SHU ሺ ↔ š $salis ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE SHI ሻ ↔ š $rabi ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE SHAA ሼ ↔ š $hamis ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE SHEE ሽ}$wordBoundary ↔ š ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE SHE ሽ ↔ š $sadis ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE SHE ሾ ↔ š $sabi ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE SHO ሿ ↔ š $diqala_rabi ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE SHWA
ቀ ↔ q $geez ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE QA ቁ ↔ q $kaib ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE QU ቂ ↔ q $salis ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE QI ቃ ↔ q $rabi ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE QAA ቄ ↔ q $hamis ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE QEE ቅ}$wordBoundary ↔ q ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE QE ቅ ↔ q $sadis ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE QE ቆ ↔ q $sabi ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE QO ቈ ↔ q $diqala_geez ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE QWA ቍ ↔ q $diqala_salis ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE QWE ቋ ↔ q $diqala_rabi ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE QWAA ቌ ↔ q $diqala_hamis ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE QWEE ቊ ↔ q $diqala_kaib ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE QWI
ቐ ↔ q̱ $geez ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE QHA ቑ ↔ q̱ $kaib ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE QHU ቒ ↔ q̱ $salis ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE QHI ቓ ↔ q̱ $rabi ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE QHAA ቔ ↔ q̱ $hamis ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE QHEE ቕ}$wordBoundary ↔ q̱ ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE QHE ቕ ↔ q̱ $sadis ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE QHE ቖ ↔ q̱ $sabi ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE QHO ቘ ↔ q̱ $diqala_geez ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE QHWA ቚ ↔ q̱ $diqala_salis ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE QHWI ቛ ↔ q̱ $diqala_rabi ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE QHWAA ቜ ↔ q̱ $diqala_hamis ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE QHWEE ቝ ↔ q̱ $diqala_kaib ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE QHWE
በ ↔ b $geez ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE BA ቡ ↔ b $kaib ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE BU ቢ ↔ b $salis ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE BI ባ ↔ b $rabi ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE BAA ቤ ↔ b $hamis ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE BEE ብ}$wordBoundary ↔ b ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE BE ብ ↔ b $sadis ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE BE ቦ ↔ b $sabi ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE BO ቧ ↔ b $diqala_rabi ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE BWA
ቨ ↔ v $geez ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE VA ቩ ↔ v $kaib ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE VU ቪ ↔ v $salis ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE VI ቫ ↔ v $rabi ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE VAA ቬ ↔ v $hamis ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE VEE ቭ}$wordBoundary ↔ v ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE VE ቭ ↔ v $sadis ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE VE ቮ ↔ v $sabi ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE VO ቯ ↔ v $diqala_rabi ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE VWA
ተ ↔ t $geez ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE TA ቱ ↔ t $kaib ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE TU ቲ ↔ t $salis ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE TI ታ ↔ t $rabi ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE TAA ቴ ↔ t $hamis ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE TEE ት}$wordBoundary ↔ t ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE TE ት ↔ t $sadis ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE ቶ ↔ t $sabi ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE TO ቷ ↔ t $diqala_rabi ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE TWA
ቸ ↔ č $geez ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE CA ቹ ↔ č $kaib ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE CU ቺ ↔ č $salis ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE CI ቻ ↔ č $rabi ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE CAA ቼ ↔ č $hamis ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE CEE ች}$wordBoundary ↔ č ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE CE ች ↔ č $sadis ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE CE ቾ ↔ č $sabi ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE CO ቿ ↔ č $diqala_rabi ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE CWA
ኀ → ḫ $rabi ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE XA ኁ ↔ ḫ $kaib ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE XU ኂ ↔ ḫ $salis ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE XI ኃ ↔ ḫ $rabi ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE XAA ኄ ↔ ḫ $hamis ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE XEE ኅ}$wordBoundary ↔ ḫ ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE XE ኅ ↔ ḫ $sadis ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE XE ኆ ↔ ḫ $sabi ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE XO ኈ ↔ ḫ $diqala_geez ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE XWA ኊ ↔ ḫ $diqala_salis ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE XWI ኋ ↔ ḫ $diqala_rabi ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE XWAA ኌ ↔ ḫ $diqala_hamis ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE XWEE ኍ ↔ ḫ $diqala_kaib ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE XWE
ነ ↔ n $geez ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE NA ኑ ↔ n $kaib ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE NU ኒ ↔ n $salis ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE NI ና ↔ n $rabi ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE NAA ኔ ↔ n $hamis ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE NEE ን}$wordBoundary ↔ n ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE NE ን ↔ n $sadis ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE NE ኖ ↔ n $sabi ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE NO ኗ ↔ n $diqala_rabi ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE NWA
ኘ ↔ ñ $geez ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE NYA ኙ ↔ ñ $kaib ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE NYU ኚ ↔ ñ $salis ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE NYI ኛ ↔ ñ $rabi ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE NYAA ኜ ↔ ñ $hamis ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE NYEE ኝ}$wordBoundary ↔ ñ ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE NYE ኝ ↔ ñ $sadis ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE NYE ኞ ↔ ñ $sabi ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE NYO ኟ ↔ ñ $diqala_rabi ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE NYWA
$wordBoundary{አ ↔ $glottal $geez ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE GLOTTAL A $wordBoundary{ኡ ↔ $glottal $kaib ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE GLOTTAL U $wordBoundary{ኢ ↔ $glottal $salis ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE GLOTTAL I $wordBoundary{ኣ → $glottal $rabi ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE GLOTTAL AA $wordBoundary{ኤ ↔ $glottal $hamis ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE GLOTTAL EE $wordBoundary{እ ↔ $glottal $sadis ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE GLOTTAL E $wordBoundary{ኦ ↔ $glottal $sabi ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE GLOTTAL O $wordBoundary{ኧ ↔ $glottal $geez ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE GLOTTAL WA
አ ↔ $glottal $rabi ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE GLOTTAL A ኡ ↔ $glottal $kaib ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE GLOTTAL U ኢ ↔ $glottal $salis ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE GLOTTAL I ኣ ↔ $glottal $rabi ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE GLOTTAL AA ኤ ↔ $glottal $hamis ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE GLOTTAL EE እ ↔ $glottal $sadis ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE GLOTTAL E ኦ ↔ $glottal $sabi ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE GLOTTAL O ኧ ↔ $glottal $geez ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE GLOTTAL WA
ከ ↔ k $geez ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE KA ኩ ↔ k $kaib ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE KU ኪ ↔ k $salis ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE KI ካ ↔ k $rabi ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE KAA ኬ ↔ k $hamis ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE KEE ክ}$wordBoundary ↔ k ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE KE ክ ↔ k $sadis ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE KE ኮ ↔ k $sabi ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE KO ኰ ↔ k $diqala_geez ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE KWA ኲ ↔ k $diqala_salis ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE KWI ኳ ↔ k $diqala_rabi ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE KWAA ኴ ↔ k $diqala_hamis ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE KWEE ኵ ↔ k $diqala_kaib ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE KWE
ኸ ↔ ẖ $geez ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE KXA ኹ ↔ ẖ $kaib ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE KXU ኺ ↔ ẖ $salis ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE KXI ኻ ↔ ẖ $rabi ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE KXAA ኼ ↔ ẖ $hamis ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE KXEE ኽ}$wordBoundary ↔ ẖ ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE KXE ኽ ↔ ẖ $sadis ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE KXE ኾ ↔ ẖ $sabi ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE KXO ዀ ↔ ẖ $diqala_geez ; # U+12C0 ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE KXWA ዂ ↔ ẖ $diqala_salis ; # U+12C2 ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE KXWI ዃ ↔ ẖ $diqala_rabi ; # U+12C3 ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE KXWAA ዄ ↔ ẖ $diqala_hamis ; # U+12C4 ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE KXWEE ዅ ↔ ẖ $diqala_kaib ; # U+12C5 ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE KXWE
ወ ↔ w $geez ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE WA ዉ ↔ w $kaib ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE WU ዊ ↔ w $salis ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE WI ዋ ↔ w $rabi ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE WAA ዌ ↔ w $hamis ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE WEE ው}$wordBoundary ↔ w ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE WE ው ↔ w $sadis ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE WE ዎ ↔ w $sabi ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE WO
ዐ → $pharyngeal $rabi ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE PHARYNGEAL A ዑ ↔ $pharyngeal $kaib ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE PHARYNGEAL U ዒ ↔ $pharyngeal $salis ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE PHARYNGEAL I ዓ ↔ $pharyngeal $rabi ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE PHARYNGEAL AA ዔ ↔ $pharyngeal $hamis ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE PHARYNGEAL EE ዕ ↔ $pharyngeal $sadis ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE PHARYNGEAL E ዖ ↔ $pharyngeal $sabi ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE PHARYNGEAL O

ጀ ↔ ǧ $geez ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE JA ጁ ↔ ǧ $kaib ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE JU ጂ ↔ ǧ $salis ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE JI ጃ ↔ ǧ $rabi ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE JAA ጄ ↔ ǧ $hamis ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE JEE ጅ}$wordBoundary ↔ ǧ ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE JE ጅ ↔ ǧ $sadis ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE JE ጆ ↔ ǧ $sabi ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE JO ጇ ↔ ǧ $diqala_rabi ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE JWA
ገ ↔ g $geez ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE GA ጉ ↔ g $kaib ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE GU ጊ ↔ g $salis ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE GI ጋ ↔ g $rabi ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE GAA ጌ ↔ g $hamis ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE GEE ግ}$wordBoundary ↔ g ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE GE ግ ↔ g $sadis ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE GE ጎ ↔ g $sabi ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE GO ጐ ↔ g $diqala_geez ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE GWA ጒ ↔ g $diqala_salis ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE GWI ጓ ↔ g $diqala_rabi ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE GWAA ጔ ↔ g $diqala_hamis ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE GWEE ጕ ↔ g $diqala_kaib ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE GWE

ጨ ↔ č̣ $geez ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE CHA ጩ ↔ č̣ $kaib ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE CHU ጪ ↔ č̣ $salis ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE CHI ጫ ↔ č̣ $rabi ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE CHAA ጬ ↔ č̣ $hamis ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE CHEE ጭ}$wordBoundary ↔ č̣ ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE CHE ጭ ↔ č̣ $sadis ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE CHE ጮ ↔ č̣ $sabi ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE CHO ጯ ↔ č̣ $diqala_rabi ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE CHWA

ፈ ↔ f $geez ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE FA ፉ ↔ f $kaib ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE FU ፊ ↔ f $salis ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE FI ፋ ↔ f $rabi ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE FAA ፌ ↔ f $hamis ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE FEE ፍ}$wordBoundary ↔ f ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE FE ፍ ↔ f $sadis ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE FE ፎ ↔ f $sabi ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE FO ፏ ↔ f $diqala_rabi ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE FWA
ፐ ↔ p $geez ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE PA ፑ ↔ p $kaib ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE PU ፒ ↔ p $salis ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE PI ፓ ↔ p $rabi ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE PAA ፔ ↔ p $hamis ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE PEE ፕ}$wordBoundary ↔ p ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE PE ፕ ↔ p $sadis ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE PE ፖ ↔ p $sabi ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE PO ፗ ↔ p $diqala_rabi ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE PWA
ፘ ↔ ry $rabi ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE RYA ፙ ↔ my $rabi ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE MYA ፚ ↔ fy $rabi ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE FYA
######################################################################## # Start of Numeric Transformations ########################################################################
፩ ↔ 1 ; # ETHIOPIC DIGIT ONE ፪ ↔ 2 ; # ETHIOPIC DIGIT TWO ፫ ↔ 3 ; # ETHIOPIC DIGIT THREE ፬ ↔ 4 ; # ETHIOPIC DIGIT FOUR ፭ ↔ 5 ; # ETHIOPIC DIGIT FIVE ፮ ↔ 6 ; # ETHIOPIC DIGIT SIX ፯ ↔ 7 ; # ETHIOPIC DIGIT SEVEN ፰ ↔ 8 ; # ETHIOPIC DIGIT EIGHT ፱ ↔ 9 ; # ETHIOPIC DIGIT NINE ፲ ↔ 10 ; # ETHIOPIC NUMBER TEN ፳ ↔ 20 ; # ETHIOPIC NUMBER TWENTY ፴ ↔ 30 ; # ETHIOPIC NUMBER THIRTY ፵ ↔ 40 ; # ETHIOPIC NUMBER FORTY ፶ ↔ 50 ; # ETHIOPIC NUMBER FIFTY ፷ ↔ 60 ; # ETHIOPIC NUMBER SIXTY ፸ ↔ 70 ; # ETHIOPIC NUMBER SEVENTY ፹ ↔ 80 ; # ETHIOPIC NUMBER EIGHTY ፺ ↔ 90 ; # ETHIOPIC NUMBER NINETY ፻ ↔ 100 ; # ETHIOPIC NUMBER HUNDRED ፼↔ '10,000' ; # ETHIOPIC NUMBER TEN HUNDRED # ፲፻ ↔ '1,000' ;
